articles.author: Diane Samson
articles.title: New Research Shows Mercury Could Have Solid Metal Core Just Like Earth
articles.description: NASA scientists revealed that like Earth, Mercury has a liquid outer core and a solid inner core. The team used data from the previous MESSENGER mission to figure out the secrets underneath the smallest planet in the solar system.
articles.content:
Planetary scientists at NASA found evidence that Mercury has a solid metal inner core that is similar in size to that of Earth's.
